name: SuitsMe: Fashion Dress Up Game
description:
Fashion is about to become a lot more fun with SuitsMe - your new favorite dress-up game!
Your virtual model Sue will need your assistance getting ready for events, from a casual Monday in the office to exclusive shows. Express your creativity and love for fashion, take part in unique daily challenges, and style looks with clothes from real-life brands.

BUILD YOUR DREAM CLOSET. Among the hundreds of items of all styles imaginable, add what you like to your collection.

SHOP FROM THE BEST. We’ve partnered with some of the best brands on the market to bring you the styles you need.

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS. Take part in exciting daily challenges, vote for your favorite looks, and receive unique bonus items for high scores.

GET INSPIRED. With hundreds of items to choose from, discover your new favorite colors, styles, and silhouettes.

Start styling now with SuitsMe!


LET’S CONNECT
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/suitsme_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SuitsMeFashion/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/SuitsMe_app/

IN-APP PURCHASING NOTE:
SuitsMe is a free-to-play app, but like many apps in the App Store, there is the option of purchasing in-app items using real money. Turn off in-app purchases on your device if you’d like to disable this feature.

SUBSCRIPTIONS NOTE:
Also in SUITSME you can use a subscription option.
As a rule, AppStore renews subscriptions at least 24 hrs before the current period end date. To find all the information on managing the subscriptions billed through Apple, please go to your iTunes account.
Please note that subscriptions are canceled through iTunes/Apple account settings, not through the SUITSME game. The subscription (as well as the free trial period) can be canceled any time but at least 24 hrs before the end date of the current period.

Privacy Policy: https://www.suitsme.club/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://www.suitsme.club/terms-conditions

Support: mailto@suitsme.club
